mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users u WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_access_log l WHERE l.user_id = u.id AND l.access_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND l.access_time < (CURDATE()) )
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM user_access_log WHERE access_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND access_time < (CURDATE())
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS count FROM users WHERE YEAR(created_at) = #{year} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m')
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(access_time, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS count FROM user_access_log WHERE YEAR(access_time) = #{year} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(access_time, '%Y-%m')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(access_time, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS count FROM user_access_log WHERE YEAR(access_time) = #{year} AND function_code = 'LOGIN_TRADEACCOUNT' AND access_status = 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(access_time, '%Y-%m')

SELECT month, IFNULL( ROUND( trade_login_users * 100 / authorized_login_users, 2 ), 0 ) AS rate FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(access_time, '%Y-%m') AS month, SUM(CASE WHEN function_code = 'LOGIN_TRADEACCOUNT' AND access_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS trade_login_users, SUM(CASE WHEN function_code = 'LOGIN' AND access_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS authorized_login_users FROM user_access_log WHERE YEAR(access_time) = #{year} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(access_time, '%Y-%m')) t
